quiz.question: My son, forget not my .........; but let thine heart keep my ............
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:1 : My son, forget not my law; but let thine heart keep my commandments

quiz.question: So shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of ............ and ............
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:4 : So shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of God and man.

quiz.question: Trust in the ........ with all thine ...........; and lean not unto thine own ...............
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:5 : Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding

quiz.question: In all thy ways ........... him, and he shall ...........
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:6 : In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

quiz.question: Be not .......... in thine own eyes: ............ the ........., and depart from evil.
quiz.hints: proverb 3:7 : Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the Lord, and depart from evil.

quiz.question: My son, despise not the ........... of the Lord; neither be weary of his ................:
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:11 : My son, despise not the chastening of the Lord; neither be weary of his correction:

quiz.question: For whom the Lord loveth he ..........; even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:12 :For whom the Lord loveth he correcteth; even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.

quiz.question: Happy is the man that findeth ........, and the man that getteth ..................
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:13 : Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.

quiz.question: The ....... shall inherit ........: but .......... shall be the promotion of .......
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:35 : The wise shall inherit glory: but shame shall be the promotion of fools.

quiz.question: For the Lord shall be thy ............., and shall keep thy ........... from being taken.
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:26 : For the Lord shall be thy confidence, and shall keep thy foot from being taken.

quiz.question: By his knowledge the depths are broken up, and the clouds drop down the dew.
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:20 : By his knowledge the depths are broken up, and the clouds drop down the dew.

quiz.question: The Lord by ............. hath founded the ........; by ............ hath he established the ............
quiz.hints: Proverb 3: 19 : The Lord by wisdom hath founded the earth; by understanding hath he established the heavens.

quiz.question: Length of days is in her ...........; and in her .......... riches and ...........
quiz.hints: proverb 3:16 : Length of days is in her right hand; and in her left hand riches and honour.

quiz.question: Say not unto thy ............., Go, and come again, and to morrow I will give; ............... it by thee.
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:28 : Say not unto thy neighbour, Go, and come again, and to morrow I will give; when thou hast it by thee.

quiz.question: The curse of the Lord is in the .................: but he blesseth the ............... of the just.
quiz.optb: house of the evil one, habitation
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:33 : The curse of the Lord is in the house of the wicked: but he blesseth the habitation of the just.

quiz.question: Envy thou not the oppressor, and choose none of his ways.
quiz.hints: Proverb 3: 31 : Envy thou not the oppressor, and choose none of his ways.

quiz.question: ........ with a man without ..........., if he have done thee ............
quiz.hints: proverb 3:30 : Strive not with a man without cause, if he have done thee no harm.

quiz.question: For the froward is ........ to the Lord: but his .......... is with the .....................
quiz.hints: Proverb 3:32 : For the froward is abomination to the Lord: but his secret is with the righteous.

quiz.question: For I give you ........, forsake ye not my ........
quiz.hints: Proverb 4:2 : For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.
